TopicTitle: Have to adjust staging upon every trip back to the VAB

Articles.Content: I have emergency parachutes on my spaceplane and these always need to be adjusted around on every trip back to the VAB.  This is maddening.

This seems to be caused by having the second stage engine as the "main" part of the construction.  I removed the cockpit from the fueselage and then attached the fueselage to the cockpit instead of the cockpit to the fueselage.  This made the cockpit the "main" part and the bug has disappeared.
